inclusion.criterion: clinical diagnosis of PFP in at least one knee
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: visual analogue score rating of pain during activities of daily living
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: insidious onset of symptoms unrelated to trauma and persistent for at least 4 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain in the anterior knee associated with at least 3 of the following
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cruciate or collateral ligament laxity or tenderness
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patellar tendon, iliotibial band, or pes anserine tenderness
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of recurrent patellar subluxation or dislocation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of surgery to the knee joint
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of head injury or vestibular disorder within the last 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
